item.title: Route-based VPN with FreeBSD-11.1's IPsec VTI
item.description: I have managed to setup route-based IPsec VPN with FreeBSD-11.1 RC3, which had introduced ipsec virtual tunnel interface if_ipsec(4). Here is a record of my experiment just for your information. Prerequisite FreeBSD-11.1-RC3/amd64 Generic kernel No special packages/ports (just added sudo and a few other must-have utilities) Network configuration NOTE: The following text shows bsd1 configurations only. 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.2 192.168.10.0/24 --- [bsd1] ----- /// ----- [bsd2] --- 192.168.20.0/24 172.
